prompt.content: Using EA (NASDAQ: EA) quarterly earnings reports, compute the absolute difference between the actual GAAP EPS CQGR (Compound Quarterly Growth Rate) and the estimated GAAP EPS CQGR of Q4 2025, Q1 2026 , Q2 2026. Use the midpoint of the GAAP EPS estimates for the estimated GAAP EPS CQGR . Give your answer as a percentage to two decimal places.

messages.content: [{"criteria":"Use EA'S quarterly releases: Q4 FY2025 (three months ended Mar 31, 2025), Q1 FY2026 (three months ended Jun 30, 2025), Q2 FY2026 (three months ended Sep 30, 2025).","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"CQGR formula and period specification: CQGR = (Ending EPS / Beginning EPS)^(1/2) − 1 with n = 2 quarters."},{"criteria":"Calculated actual GAAP EPS CQGR = −25.77% (per quarter), computed as ((0.54 / 0.98)^(1/2) − 1).","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Calculated estimated GAAP EPS CQGR = −32.58% (per quarter), computed as ((0.375 / 0.825)^(1/2) − 1).","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Absolute difference between actual and estimated CQGRs -> 6.81%"},{"criteria":"Actual GAAP diluted EPS Q1 FY2026 IS $0.79","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Include Actual GAAP diluted EPS Q2 FY2026 = $0.54"},{"criteria":"Actual GAAP diluted EPS Q4 FY2025 is $0.98","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Final answer reported to two decimal places - 6.81%"},{"criteria":"Estimated GAAP EPS guidance midpoint: Q4 FY2025 midpoint is $0.825 (range $0.65–$1.00)","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Estimated GAAP EPS guidance midpoint: Q2 FY2026 midpoint is $0.375 (range $0.29–$0.46) ","operator":"correctness"}]
